message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
My turn. How about a 55/45 split? It's still generous considering the inflation.
Considering the inflation, 58-42 is the new fair deal!
This is getting us nowhere. Let's be reasonable - 52/48 split?
Come on, meet me in the middle, 57-43 is a good compromise!
Okay, enough games. A 50/50 split is the only fair option. Take it or leave it.
